alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 18 at 5:45AM MST until May 20 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ THURSDAY TO 8 PM PDT /8 PM MST/ FRIDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE LAKE MEAD NATIONAL RECREATION AREA AND LOWER COLORADO RIVER VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ Thursday to 8 PM PDT /8 PM MST/ Friday. This replaces the Fire Weather Watch. * TIMING...Thursday morning through Friday evening. * WIND...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity levels of 5 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead NRA, Colorado River-AZ side
